short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bring the captivating world of Remilia Scarlet from Touhou Project to your browser with this stunning Chrome extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Featuring live wallpapers of the elegant vampire, Remilia’s graceful yet powerful presence will enhance your new tab page every time you open it.

Features:
🎨 High-quality live wallpaper of Remilia Scarlet from Touhou Project.
🌐 Customizable search bar to use your preferred search engine.
🕒 Clock and date display for a stylish and functional layout.
🔗 Quick-access shortcuts for smooth navigation to your favorite websites.
Immerse yourself in the mystical allure of Remilia Scarlet, adding a touch of vampire elegance and fantasy to your browsing experience. Perfect for fans of Touhou Project and its iconic characters.
